biotools.summary: The aim of this server is to predict beta turns in proteins from multiple alignment by using neural network from the given amino acid sequence. For beta turn prediction, it uses the position specific score matrices generated by PSI-BLAST and secondary structure predicted by PSIPRED.

bioschemas.name: BetatPred2
